juzs.text: 67|1|Duo fu zai yongyou zhuquan zhe! Ta dui yu wanshi shi quanneng de.
67|2|Ta ceng chuangzaole sisheng, yibian ta kaoyan nimen shei de zuowei shi zui youmei de. Ta shi wanneng de, shi zhi she de.
67|3|Ta chuangzaole qi ceng tian, ni zai zhiren zhu de suo zaowu zhong, buneng kan chu yidian cenci. Ni zai kan kan! Ni jiujing neng kan chu shenme quexian ne?
67|4|Ranhou ni zai kan liang ci, ni de yanjing jiang hunhua di, pijuan di zhuan huilai!
67|5|Wo que yi yi zhong xing dianzhui zuijin de tian, bing shi zhong xing xiji emomen. Wo yi wei tamen yubei huo yu de xingfa.
67|6|Bu xin zhu de renmen jiang shou huo yu de xingfa, na guisu zhen elie!
67|7|Dang tamen bei touru huo yu de shihou, tamen jiang tingjian feiteng de huo yu fachu lu ming ban de shengyin.
67|8|Huo yu jihu wei fennu er posui, mei you yiqun ren bei touru qizhong, guan huo yu de tianshimen jiu dui tamen shuo: “Nandao meiyou renhe jinggao zhe jianglin nimen ma?”
67|9|Tamen shuo: Buran! Jinggao zhe que yi jianglin womenle, dan women fouren tamen, women shuo:“An la meiyou jiang shi shenme, nimen zhi zai zhongda de mi wu zhong.
67|10|Tamen shuo:“Jiaruo women neng tingcong, huo neng mingli, women bi buzhi lun yu huo yu de jumin zhi lie!”
67|11|Tamen chengren tamen de zuiguo. Rang huo yu de jumin yuanli an la de ci'en!
67|12|Zai mimi zhong weiju zhu de renmen, jiang meng she youhe zhongda de baochou.
67|13|Nimen keyi yinni nimen de yanyu; ye keyi ba ta shuo chulai. Ta que shi quanzhi xinshi de.
67|14|Chuangzao zhe jishi xuanmiao erqie che zhi de, nandao ta bu zhidao nimen suo yinni de yanyu ma?
67|15|Ta wei nimen er shi dadi pingwen, nimen yingdang zai dadi de ge fang xingzou, yingdang chi ta de jiyang, nimen fuhuo hou, zhi guiyu ta.
67|16|Nandao nimen bupa zai tianshang de zhu shi dadi zai zhendang de shihou tunyan nimen ma?
67|17|Nandao nimen bupa zai tianshang de zhu shi feishazoushi de baofeng cuihui nimen ma? Nimen jiang zhidao wo de jinggao shi zenyang de.
67|18|Zai tamen zhiqian shiqu de renmen, que yi fouren zhong shizhe, wo de qianze shi zenyang de?
67|19|Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian zai tamen de shangmian zhanchi he lian yi de zhong niao ma? Zhiyou zhiren zhu weichi tamen, ta que shi mingcha wanwu de.
67|20|Chule an la yuanzhu nimen wai, hai you shei neng zuo nimen de yuanjun ni? Nimen zhi xianyu zi qi zhi zhong.
67|21|Shei neng gongji nimen ne? Ruguo zhiren zhu kouliu ta de jiyang. Buran, tamen guzhizhuo jiao'ao he beini.
67|22|Jiujing shei geng neng huode yindao ne? Shi pufu er xing de ren ne? Haishi zai zheng lushang ting xiong er xing de ren ne?
67|23|Ni shuo:“Ta shi chuangzao nimen, bing wei nimen chuangzao er, mu he xin de. Nimen que hen shao ganxie.”
67|24|Ni shuo: Ta shi shi nimen fanzhi yu da dishang de, nimen jianglai yao bei jihe dao ta nali.
67|25|Tamen shuo:“Zhege jinggao shenme shihou shixian ne? Ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.”
67|26|Ni shuo: Guanyu ci shi de zhishi, zhi zai zhu nali, wo zhishi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe.
67|27|Dang tamen kanjian zhe yingxu linjin de shihou, buxin de renmen de mianmu jiang bian cheng hei de! Huozhe jiang shuo:“Zhe jiushi nimen shengqian wangyan bu hui shixian de shi.”
67|28|Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba, ruguo an la huimie wo, he wo de tong jiao, huo lianmin women, name, shei shi bu xindao de renmen de mian yu tongku de xingfa ne?
67|29|Ni shuo:“Ta shi zhiren zhu, women yi xinyang ta, women zhi tuo kao ta. Nimen jiang zhidao shei zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.”
67|30|Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba, ruguo nimen de shui yidan shen loule, shei neng gei nimen yitiao liushui ne?”
68|1|Nu nai, yi bi he tamen suo xie de mengshi,
68|2|ni wei zhu de endian, ni jue bushi yige feng ren,
68|3|ni bidei xiangshou buduan de baochou.
68|4|Ni que shi jubei yi zhong weida di xingge de.
68|5|Ni jiang kanjian, tamen ye jiang kanjian,
68|6|nimen jiujing shei shi hai feng bing de.
68|7|Ni de zhu dique zhidao shei shi panli ta de zhengdao de, ta dique zhidao shei shi zunxun ta de zhengdao de.
68|8|Ni buyao shuncong fouren zhenli de renmen,
68|9|tamen xiwang ni roushun, tamen ye roushun.
68|10|Ni buyao shuncong mei ge wang shi de, beijian de,
68|11|shuohuang de, jin chan de,
68|12|linse de,guo fen de, fanzui de,
68|13|cubi erqie shi sishengzi de ren.
68|14|Na shi yinwei ta shi you caichan he zisi de.
68|15|Dang bieren dui ta xuandu wo de jixiang de shihou, ta shuo: Zhe shi guren de gushi.
68|16|Wo jiang zai ta de bizi shang dashang laoyin.
68|17|Wo que yi kaoyan tamen, youru kaoyan yuanpu de zhurenmen yiyang. Dangshi, tamen ceng mengshi, tamen biding zai zaochen shouhuo yuanpu zhong de guoshi,
68|18|bing bu liu yibufen gei pinmin.
68|19|Dang tamen zhengzai shuijiao de shihou, cong ni de zhu fachu de zainan jianglin nage yuanpu,
68|20|yidan zhi jian bian cheng jiaotu yiyang.
68|21|Tamen ceng zai zaochen bici xiang hu:
68|22|Nimen dang zai zaochen dao yuan li qu, ruguo nimen yao xiang shouhuo.
68|23|Tamen zoule, tuzhong qiaoqiao de shangyi shuo:
68|24|Jintian jue buyao rang yige pinmin zou jin yuanpu.
68|25|Tamen zaochen qilai yiwei ziji shi neng ezhi de.
68|26|Dang tamen kanjian yuanpu de shihou, tamen shuo:“Women dui shi mi wu de,
68|27|buran, women shi bei boduo de!”
68|28|Tamen zhong zui youxiu de ren shuo:“Nandao wo meiyou dui nimen shuo ma? Nimen zenme bu zansong an la ni?”
68|29|Tamen shuo:“Zansong women de zhu chaojue wanwu! Women que shi bu yi de.”
68|30|Yushi tamen zouxiang qian lai, huxiang tanlun.
68|31|Tamen shuo:“Shang zai women! Women yuanlai que shi fangdang zhe.
68|32|Huoxu women de zhu, yi yige bi zhe hai hao de yuanpu, buchang women, women que shi kenqiu women de zhu de.”
68|33|Xingfa jiushi nayang de. Houshi de xingfa que shi geng zhongda de, jiaru tamen zhidao.
68|34|Jingwei de renmen, zai tamen de zhu nali, bi jiang xiangshou enze de leyuan.
68|35|Nandao wo shi guishun de renxiang fanzui de ren yiyang ma?
68|36|Nimen you she me liyou? Nimen zenme zheyang panduan ne!
68|37|Nandao youyi ben ke gong nimen song xi de tian jing,
68|38|Zai na ben tian jing li nimen que you ziji suo xuanze de.
68|39|Nandao wo ceng yu nimen dijieguo fuhuo ri cai man qi de, jianding de mengyue, yin'er nimen que you nimen suo panduan de?
68|40|Ni wen tamen, tamen zhong you shei neng baozheng na jian shi ne?
68|41|Nandao tamen you xuduo pei zhu ma? Jiao tamen ba naxie pei zhu zhaohuan lai, ruguo tamen shi chengshi de ren.
68|42|Zai na ri, da nan jiang lintou, tamen jiang bei zhao qu koutou, er tamen buneng koutou.
68|43|Tongshi, tamen shen zao lingru, bu gan yangshi. Er guoqu tamen jianquan de shihou, ceng bei zhao qu koutou.
68|44|Ni rang wo chengzhi fouren zhe xun ci de ren ba! Wo jiang shi tamen buzhi bu jue de jian qu yu huimie.
68|45|Wo yourong tamen, wo de jice que shi zhoumi de.
68|46|Ni xiang tamen suoqu baochou, jiao tamen danfu tai zhong ne?
68|47|Haishi tamen neng zhi youxuan, gu jiayi jilu ne?
68|48|Gu ni yingdang renshou ni de zhu de panjue, buyao xiang nage zangshen yu fu de ren yiyang. Dangshi, ta aozhe nu huyu ta de zhu;
68|49|jiaruo cong ta de zhu fachu de endian meiyou dadao ta, name, ta bi shou zebei di bei pao dao huangliang di difang.
68|50|Sihou, ta de zhu jianxuanle ta, bing shi ta ru yu shanren zhi lie.
68|51|Buxindao de renmen jihu yi tamen de numu shi ni diedao. Dang tamen ting dao xuandu jiaohui de shihou, tamen shuo:“Ta que shi yige fengzi.”
68|52|Zhe “gulanjing” bushi bie de, ta shi dui quan shijie de jiaohui.
69|1|Zhen zai,
69|2|zhen zai shi shenme?
69|3|Ni zenme neng renshi zhen zai shi shenme ne?
69|4|Sai mo de ren he a de ren, ceng fouren da nan.
69|5|Zhiyu sai mo de ren ne, yi wei yanxing suo huimie;
69|6|zhiyu a de ren, yi wei nuhou de baofeng suo huimie.
69|7|An la ceng shi baofeng duizhe tamen lian guale qiye ba zhou, ni kan a de ren dao zai dishang, haoxiang kongxin di hai zao shugan yiyang.
69|8|Ni neng kanjian tamen hai you jieyi ma?
69|9|Falao he zai ta zhiqian de ren, yiji bei qingfu de chengshi de jumin, you zai fanzui,
69|10|tamen ceng weikang tamen de zhu de shizhe, gu ta yanli chengzhile tamen.
69|11|Dang da shui fanlan de shihou, wo rang nimen cheng chuan,
69|12|yibian wo yi na jian shi wei nimen de jiaoxun, yibian neng jiyi de erduo ba ta ji zhu.
69|13|Dang haojiao yixiang,
69|14|dadi he shanyue dou bei yidong, qie huxiang pengzhuang yici de shihou;
69|15|zai na ri, na jian dashi jiang fasheng,
69|16|tian jiang polie; zai na ri, tian jiang chengwei cuiruo de.
69|17|Zhong tianshi jiang zai tian de ge fang; zai na ri, zai tamen shangmian, jiang you ba ge tianshi, danfu ni de zhu de baozuo;
69|18|zai na ri, nimen jiang bei jianyue, nimen de renhe mimi, dou wufa yincang.
69|19|Yong youshou jieshou ziji de gongguo bu de ren jiang shuo:“Nimen na wo de gongguo bu qu du du ba!
69|20|Wo que yi caixiang dao wo bi yujian wo de zhangmu.
69|21|Ta jiang zai yukuai de shenghuo zhong;
69|22|zai chonggao de leyuan zhong,
69|23|nalimian de shuiguo shenshou ke de.
69|24|Nimen keyi yukuai di yinshi, yinwei nimen zai guoqu de suiyue zhongxingguo shan.
69|25|Yi zuoshou jieguo ziji de gongguo bu de ren jiang shuo:“Aya! Dan yuan wo meiyou jieguo wo de gongguo bu,
69|26|bu zhidao wo ziji de zhangmu!
69|27|Dan yuan chenshi de siwang yi liaojie wo de yisheng!
69|28|Wo de caichan yu wo hao wu biyi,
69|29|wo de quanbing yi cong wo de shouzhong xiaoshi.
69|30|Nimen zhuo zhu ta, gei ta dai shang jiasuo,
69|31|ranhou ba ta tou zai liehuo li,
69|32|ranhou ba ta chuan zai yitiao qishi bi zhang de lianzi shang.”
69|33|Ta shengqian que shi bu xinyang zunda de an la,
69|34|bu mianli ren zhenji pinmin de ren.
69|35|Gu jinri ta zai zheli meiyou yige qinqi.
69|36|Chu nong zhi wai, ta meiyou shiwu.
69|37|Zhiyou mi wu de renmen cai chi nong zhi.
69|38|Buran! Wo yi nimen suo neng jian de wanxiang mengshi,
69|39|bingqie yi nimen buneng jian de youxuan mengshi,
69|40|zhe que shi yige zungui de shizhe de yanci,
69|41|bing bushi shiren de yanci, nimen hen shao xinyang,
69|42|ye bushi puren de yanci, nimen hen shao juewu.
69|43|Zhe shi cong quan shijie de zhu jiang shi de.
69|44|Jiaruo ta jiajie wo de mingyi, niezao yaoyan,
69|45|wo bi yi quanli daibu ta,
69|46|ranhou bi geduan ta de dadongmai,
69|47|nimen zhong meiyou yige ren neng baowei ta.
69|48|Zhe que shi dui jingwei zhe de jiaoxun.
69|49|Wo dique zhidao nimen zhong you fouren de ren.
69|50|Zhe duiyu bu xindao de renmen que shi huihen.
69|51|Zhe que shi zhenshi de xinnian,
69|52|gu ni dang songyang ni de zhu de daming.
70|1|Youren ceng qingqiu yi zhong jiang fasheng de xingfa.
70|2|Na shi wei bu xin de renmen er yuding de, meiyou renhe ren neng jiayi dikang.
70|3|Na shi an la--tianti de zhuzai--fachu de,
70|4|zhong tianshi he jingshen zai yi ri zhi nei sheng dao ta na li. Na yi ri de changdu shi wu wan nian.
70|5|Ni anran di renshou ba.
70|6|Tamen yiwei na xingfa shi hen yuan de,
70|7|wo que yiwei na shi hen jin de.
70|8|Zai na ri tian xiang rong tong,
70|9|shan xiang cai rong.
70|10|Qinqi xiang jian bu xiang wen.
70|11|Zuiren yuanyi shu qu na ri de xingfa, jishi xisheng ta de ernu,
70|12|ta de qizi, ta de dixiong,
70|13|he na shourong ta de xuezu,
70|14|yiji da dishang suoyou de ren, dan yuan na neng zhengjiu ziji.
70|15|Jue buran, na que shi fa yan de liehuo,
70|16|neng jie qu toupi,
70|17|neng zhaohuan zhuanshen er taobi de ren.
70|18|Ta ceng juji caichan jiayi baocang,
70|19|ren que shi bei zaocheng fuzao de,
70|20|zaoyu zaiyang de shihou shi fannao de,
70|21|huode caifu de shihou shi linse de.
70|22|Zhiyou libai de renmen, bushi nayang,
70|23|tamen shi chang shou bai gong de;
70|24|tamen de caichan zhong you yige ding fen,
70|25|shi yong yu shi ji qigai he pinmin de;
70|26|tamen shi chengren baoying zhi ri de;
70|27|tamen shi weiju tamen de zhu de xingfa de.
70|28|Tamen de zhu de xingfa, que shi nanbao bu jianglin de.
70|29|Tamen shi baoshou zhencao de,
70|30|chufei tamen dui ziji de qizi he nubi, tamen que shi bu yinci er shou zebei de;
70|31|fan zai zhege fanwei zhi wai you suo yaoqiu de ren, dou shiguo fen de.
70|32|Tamen shi zunzhong ziji suo shou de xintuo, he ziji suo di de mengyue de;
70|33|tamen shi binggong zuozheng de;
70|34|tamen shi jin shou bai gong de.
70|35|Zhe deng ren, shi zai leyuan zhong shou youdai de.
70|36|Bu xindao de renmen, zenme zhushizhe nimen, sanwu cheng qun de fen lie
70|37|zai ni de zuoyou ne?
70|38|Nandao tamen mei geren dou xiwang ru enze de leyuan ma?
70|39|Jue buran! Wo que yi yong tamen suo zhidao de wuzhi chuangzaole tamen.
70|40|Buran, wo yi yiqie dongfang he xifang de zhu mengshi, wo que shi quanneng de,
70|41|wo neng yi bi tamen geng hao de ren daiti tamen, wo bushi wuneng de.
70|42|Ni yingdang ren tamen wang tan, ren tamen youxi, zhidao tamen kan dao tamen suo bei jinggao de rizi.
70|43|Zai na ri, tamen jiang cong fen zhong chulai benzou, tamen haoxiang ben dao paiwei yiyang,
70|44|tongshi, tamen shen zao lingru, bu gan yangshi. Na shi tamen bei jinggao de rizi.
71|1|Wo que yi pai qian nu ha qu jiaohua ta de zongzu, wo shuo:“Zai tongku de xingfa jianglin ni de zongzu zhiqian, ni dang jinggao tamen.”
71|2|Ta shuo: Wo de zongzu a! Wo que shi nimen de tanshuai de jinggao zhe,
71|3|nimen yingdang chongbai an la, yingdang jingwei ta, yingdang fucong wo,
71|4|ta jiu she you nimen de zuiguo, bingqie rang nimen yanchi dao yige dingqi. An la de dingqi yidan lailin de shihou, shi jue bu yanchi de, jiaruo nimen zhidao.
71|5|Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que yi riye zhaohuan wo de zongzu,
71|6|dan wo de zhaohuan shi tamen yujia taobi.
71|7|Wo mei ci zhaohuan tamen lai shou ni de she you de shihou, tamen zong shi yi zhitou sai zhu tamen de erduo, yi yifu meng zhu tamen de tou, tamen guzhi er zi da.
71|8|Ranhou wo dasheng zhaohuan tamen,
71|9|ranhou wo gongkai di xundao tamen, mimi de quan jian tamen,
71|10|wo shuo, nimen yingdang xiang nimen de zhu qiurao--ta que shi zhi she de
71|11|ta jiu shi fengzu de yushui jianglin nimen,
71|12|bingqie yi caichan he zisi yuanzhu nimen, wei nimen chuangzao yuanpu he heliu.
71|13|Nimen zenme bu xiwang an la de zunzhong ne?
71|14|Ta que yijingguo ji ge jieduan chuangzaole nimen.
71|15|Nandao nimen meiyou kan dao an la zenyang chuangzao qi ceng tian,
71|16|bing yi yueliang wei guangming, yi taiyang wei mingdeng ma?
71|17|An la shi nimen cong dadi shengzhang chulai,
71|18|ranhou shi nimen zai fan yu dadi, ranhou, you ba nimen cong dadi qu chulai.
71|19|An la wei nimen er pingzhan dadi,
71|20|yibian nimen zai da dishang zouzhe kuankuo de daolu.
71|21|Nu ha shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Tamen que yi weikang wo, tamen shuncong na yin caichan he zisi er gengjia kui she de renmen,
71|22|na deng ren ceng dingle yige zhongda de jimou,
71|23|tamen shuo:“Nimen jue buyao fangqi nimen de zhong shenming, nimen jue buyao fangqi wang de, su wa er, ye wu si, ye ou ge, nai si er.
71|24|Tamen que yi shi xuduo ren mi wu, qiu ni shi bu yi de renmen gengjia mi wu.”
71|25|Tamen yinwei ziji de zui'e er bei yan si, sui duo ru huo yu, gu tamen meiyou huode yuanzhu de renmen lai diyu an la.
71|26|Nu ha shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao liu yige bu xindao zhe zai da dishang,
71|27|ruguo ni liu tamen, tamen jiang shi ni de zhong pu mi wu, tamen zhi shengyu bu daode de, bu gan'en de zinu.
71|28|Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni she you wo he wo de fumu, she you xindao er ru wo de fangwu de ren, yiji xinshimen hexin numen. Qiu ni shi bu yi de renmen gengjia huimie.”
72|1|Ni shuo:“Wo ceng feng dao qishi: You ji ge jingling yijing jing ting, bingqie shuo:‘Women que yi tingjian qiyi de “gulanjing”,
72|2|ta neng dao ren yu zhengdao, gu women xinyang ta, women jue bu yi renhe wu pei women de zhu.
72|3|Zansong women de zhu de zunyan! Chaojue wanwu, ta meiyou ze qu qi shi, ye meiyou ze qu ernu.
72|4|Women zhong de yong yu, chang yi beimiu de shi wumie an la,
72|5|women ceng caixiang ren he jingling jue bu wumie an la.
72|6|Ceng you yixie nanren, qiu xie nan jingling baohu tamen, yin'er shi tamen gengjia jiao'ao.
72|7|Naxie nanren ceng xiang nimen yiyang caixiang an la jue bu shi renhe si wu fuhuo.
72|8|Women ceng shitan tian, faxian tianshang bu man jianqiang de weishi he canlan de xingsu.
72|9|Guoqu, women wei qieting er changchang zuo zai tianshang ke zuo di difang. Xianzai shei qu qieting, shei jiu faxian yi ke canlan de xingsu zai dengzhe ta.
72|10|Women bu zhidao, jiujing shi da dishang de wanwu jiang zao huannan ne? Haishi tamen de zhu yu yin tamen yu zhengdao ne?
72|11|Women zhong you shanliang de, you ci yu shanliang de, women shi fen wei xuduo paibie de.
72|12|Women xiangxin, women zai da dishang, jue buneng shi an la wunai, ye jue buneng taobi an la de qianze.
72|13|Dang women tingjian zhengdao de shihou, women yi xinyang ta. Shei xinyang zhu, shei bupa kekou, ye bupa shouru.
72|14|Women zhong you shunfu de, you guaizhang de. Fan shunfu de, dou shi youzhiyu zhengdao de.
72|15|Zhi yu guaizhang de, jiang zuo huo yu de ranliao.”
72|16|Jiaru tamen zunxun zhengdao, wo bi shangci tamen de fengfu de yushui,
72|17|yibian wo yi yushui kaoyan tamen. Shei tuibi zhu de jiaoxun, ta jiang shi shei ru zai yanjun de xingfa zhong.
72|18|Yiqie qingzhensi, dou shi an la de, gu nimen yingdang qidao an la, buyao qidao renhe wu.
72|19|Dang an la de puren qilai qidao de shihou, tamen jihu qunqi er gong zhi.
72|20|Ni shuo:“Wo zhi qidao wo de zhu, wo bu yi renhe wu pei ta.”
72|21|Ni shuo:“Wo buneng wei nimen zhuchi huo fu.”
72|22|Ni shuo:“Renhe ren buneng baohu wo bu shou an la de chengfa; chu an la wai, wo jue buneng faxian renhe binan suo.
72|23|Wo zhi neng chuanda cong an la jiang shi de tongzhi he shiming. Shei weikang an la he shizhe, shei bi shou huo yu de xingfa, erqie yong ju qizhong.
